bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Sizing Nickel-Cadmium Batteries for Stationary Applications
IEEE Recommended Practice for Sizing Nickel-Cadmium Batteries for Stationary Applications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by 1115-2000. Methods for defining the dc load and for sizing a nickel-cadmium battery to supply that load are described. Installation, maintenance, qualification, testing procedures, and consideration of battery types other than nickel-cadmium batteries are not included. Design of the dc system and sizing of the battery charger(s) are also not included.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
